name: Upupa
description: Server and client for bird projects

scripts.test: npm run test:frontend; npm run test:backend
scripts.start: cd frontend; npm start & cd ../backend; npm start
scripts.docker:build: ./injectVersion.sh; cp -a frontend/dist backend/public; docker build backend --tag upupa:local-build --file Dockerfile
scripts.cleaninstall: cd frontend; npm ci && cd ../backend; npm ci

author: rednil
